frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-twitchlive-panel
frozen.shortDescription: A panel showing whether your favorite Twitch.tv streamers are streaming.
frozen.longDescription:
A panel showing whether your favorite Twitch.tv streamers are streaming.

Cycles through the online streamers if multiples are configured. Click on the panel and then on streamer's name to launch the stream with a custom command (your browser or some other application).

Needs curl and mogrify to fully support streamer logos. For an extension version compatible with shell version 3.30 or earlier visit our github page.
